00057 class Trainer /*: boost::noncopyable*/{
00058     public:
00059         virtual ~Trainer() {}
00060         virtual void train(size_t iter = 15, double tol = 1E-05) = 0;
00061 
00062         // void save_param(const string& model, bool binary) const;
00063 
00064         void load_training_data(const string& events, const string& model);
00065 
00066         void set_training_data(shared_ptr<MEEventSpace> es,
00067                 shared_ptr<ParamsType> params,
00068                 size_t n_theta,
00069                 shared_array<double> theta,
00070                 shared_array<double> sigma2,
00071                 size_t n_outcomes,
00072                 shared_ptr<MEEventSpace> heldout_es =
00073                 shared_ptr<MEEventSpace>()
00074                 );
00075 
00076     protected:
00077         size_t m_n_outcomes;
00078         size_t m_N;          // total number of examples
00079         size_t m_n_theta;
00080 
00081         shared_ptr<MEEventSpace> m_es;
00082         shared_ptr<MEEventSpace> m_heldout_es;
00083         shared_ptr<ParamsType>   m_params;

00085         shared_array<double>     m_sigma2;
00086

00090         // void save_param_txt(const string& model) const;
